pr_title: Move python code and doc for the vespa API

timeline.bodyText: If this one is autogenerated, it should not be checked in ?
timeline.author: aressem
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,141 @@
+*.bak
+.gitattributes
+.last_checked
+.gitconfig
+*.bak
+*.log
+*~
+~*
+_tmp*
+tmp*
+tags
+
+# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
+__pycache__/
+*.py[cod]
+*$py.class
+
+# C extensions
+*.so
+
+# Distribution / packaging
+.Python
+env/
+build/
+develop-eggs/
+dist/
+downloads/
+eggs/
+.eggs/
+lib/
+lib64/
+parts/
+sdist/
+var/
+wheels/
+*.egg-info/
+.installed.cfg
+*.egg
+
+# PyInstaller
+#  Usually these files are written by a python script from a template
+#  before PyInstaller builds the exe, so as to inject date/other infos into it.
+*.manifest
+*.spec
+
+# Installer logs
+pip-log.txt
+pip-delete-this-directory.txt
+
+# Unit test / coverage reports
+htmlcov/
+.tox/
+.coverage
+.coverage.*
+.cache
+nosetests.xml
+coverage.xml
+*.cover
+.hypothesis/
+
+# Translations
+*.mo
+*.pot
+
+# Django stuff:
+*.log
+local_settings.py
+
+# Flask stuff:
+instance/
+.webassets-cache
+
+# Scrapy stuff:
+.scrapy
+
+# Sphinx documentation
+docs/_build/
+
+# PyBuilder
+target/
+
+# Jupyter Notebook
+.ipynb_checkpoints
+
+# pyenv
+.python-version
+
+# celery beat schedule file
+celerybeat-schedule
+
+# SageMath parsed files
+*.sage.py
+
+# dotenv
+.env
+
+# virtualenv
+.venv
+venv/
+ENV/
+
+# Spyder project settings
+.spyderproject
+.spyproject
+
+# Rope project settings
+.ropeproject
+
+# mkdocs documentation
+/site
+
+# mypy
+.mypy_cache/
+
+.vscode
+*.swp
+
+# osx generated files
+.DS_Store
+.DS_Store?
+.Trashes
+ehthumbs.db
+Thumbs.db
+.idea
+
+# pytest
+.pytest_cache
+
+# tools/trust-doc-nbs
+docs_src/.last_checked
+
+# symlinks to fastai
+docs_src/fastai
+tools/fastai
+
+# link checker
+checklink/cookies.txt
+
+# .gitconfig is now autogenerated

replies.bodyText: It came with the package template. Is there an issue to have it within the python package folder?
replies.author: thigm85

timeline.bodyText: No need for this one here it is already in the root of the repo.
timeline.author: aressem
aressem
